effect.name: HSV Key
effect.description: Turns a certain HSV range into transparency. Operates on YUV colors.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.hue
Hue
parameter.comment:
Set the hue value which
will be used in color difference calculation

parameter.name: av.sat
Saturation
parameter.comment:
Set the saturation value
which will be used in color difference calculation

parameter.name: av.val
Value
parameter.comment:
Set the value which will
be used in color difference calculation

parameter.name: av.similarity
Similarity
parameter.comment: Set similarity percentage with the key color
